channel.title: Sliders on TWH @ Utah
channel.description: Recent content in Sliders on TWH @ Utah

item.title: Join us!
item.description: Open PhD and Postdoc Positions We are looking for self-motivated PhD students and postdoc who are interested in Parallel and Distributed Systems, Electronic Design Automation, Machine Learning Systems, and Programming Models. We expect you to have the following characteristics: Strong motivation C/C++/Python/Linux programming experience Good English communication and writing skills Experience with parallel programming, distributed systems, electronic design automation, and machine learning is a big plus! Please also take a look at our Research Projects to see our research activities.
